overview:
Justin is the Chief Financial Officer of Pronto, a division of IAC/Interactive. Prior to that role, Justin was the VP of Finance for a group of emerging IAC businesses. During that tenure he successfully managed the build out and automation of a revenue forecasting and reporting data center which supported as many as 25 IAC brands which provided unprecedented granular visibility to key performance metrics as well as business efficiency. In addition he’s worked on a number of M&A exercises as well as multiple new business initiatives. Justin has also executed many AR/billing system and general financial reporting system migrations. Additionally, he conducted a number of income statement/balance sheet audits which improved company cash flow. Before joining IAC, Justin held finance and operations positions at Ziff Davis Media and Time Inc. where he successfully managed a multitude of initiatives ranging from price elasticity analysis’, campaign level ROI analysis’, building multivariate regression models, and projects aimed at reducing customer aging.

Justin graduated from Marist College with a BA in Advertising.
